entry.title: Wednesday: Near blizzard. High minus 13 with temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Near blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 13 with temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 30.
